snippet: Nearly 6 percent of all third through eighth graders must attend the classes, down from 6.3 percent last year, the city’s Education Department said....
lead_paragraph: Nearly 6 percent of all third through eighth graders must attend the classes, down from 6.3 percent last year, the city’s Education Department said.

headline.main: Fewer New York Students Will Attend Summer School, Continuing a Trend
headline.print_headline: Fewer Students Will Attend Summer School This Year
